experts.title: 01_hello_world.py - Foundation Flow
experts.architecture: Demonstrates the core Amplifier pattern: bundle composition → preparation → session creation → execution
experts.fullCode:
#!/usr/bin/env python3
"""
Example 1: Hello World - Your First Amplifier Agent

VALUE PROPOSITION:
Get an AI agent running in ~15 lines of code. No boilerplate, no configuration hell.
Just load, compose, and execute.
"""

import asyncio
import os
from pathlib import Path

from amplifier_foundation import load_bundle

async def main():
    # Load foundation bundle
    foundation_path = Path(__file__).parent.parent
    foundation = await load_bundle(str(foundation_path))
    
    # Load provider bundle
    provider_path = foundation_path / "providers" / "anthropic-sonnet.yaml"
    provider = await load_bundle(str(provider_path))
    
    # Compose and prepare
    composed = foundation.compose(provider)
    prepared = await composed.prepare()
    
    # Create session and execute
    session = await prepared.create_session()
    async with session:
        response = await session.execute(
            "Write a Python function to check if a number is prime."
        )
        print(response)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    asyncio.run(main())

execution.defaultPrompt: Write a Python function to check if a number is prime. Include docstring and type hints.
